title: Constant Black screens
body:
So for the past few games that i've been in, I have a 50/50 chance of having the game crash on me during the loading screen, with the "unable to connect to server, if you have a firewall active...." error appearing. This has happened with both the legacy and new client. Sometimes, I also won't be able to re-log into my account until after the current game is over, with the "unexpected error has occurred" message showing up.

I've tried most fixes, used the hextech repair tool, allowed League through the firewall and inbound connections, and used every fix i could find on the forums but still no luck. It's pretty frustrating especially since I now have very long leaverbuster wait times. Any response would be much appreciated!

replies.body:
Some of the symptoms you've described are pretty common for general *unstable connections* to our gameservers. These unstable connections are usually caused by specific network settings that just aren't compatible with League, so I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

If you still experience these issues after working through our guide, please let me know.
I've already done everything the connection guide has suggested, and still no luck. The game actually just crashed while I replied.

Gotcha. At this point, I'd like to escalate this to our tech team, which you can reach via a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you run some system logs with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) then attach them to your ticket, you'll experience quicker response times.

Let me know if you have any issues with this.
Thank you! I will keep you updated!
